short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to get times for different timezones

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This app aims to save time to users who collaborate across the globe. We spend a lot of time checking what the time is in different timezones. 

With this extension, users can save their frequently used timezones. They can check the live time in different timezones with a popup. They can also paste certain time or date times, and get the converted time as a result. Lastly, users can copy the times to their clipboard.
